Modern sumo wrestler with a oicho style chonmage. The chonmage (, 
) is a form of Japanese traditional topknot haircut worn by men. It is 
most commonly associated with the Edo Period and samurai, and in recent times 
with sumo wrestlers. ... Unlike the traditional chonmage, the hair on top of the 
head is kept long, and...
